CustomField.description: Attribute name from Product housing calculation value
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Attribute name from Product housing calculation value. Valid product level fields are: 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price'. Valid related objects are: 'PricebookEntry' and 'Product2'.
CustomField.label: Product Calculation Field
